title: BERNAL HEIGHTS LARGE FLAT - SELDOM AVAIL. CHARMING ALL REMOD LARGE
posting_body: BEST LOCATION, WALKING DISTANCE TO MISSION ST AND CORTLAND AVE WITH THE SHOPS AND RESTAURANTS
~ ~  GORGEOUS LARGE FULL FLOOR FLAT WITH EXCELLENT ARCHITECTURAL AND DESIGN APPEAL ~ HUGE DINING ROOM WITH BEAMED AND PAINTED CEILING....DECORATIVE FIREPLACES....
CONVENIENT SPLIT BATHROOM.....MARBLE TILE FLOOR KITCHEN....LARGE SUNNY YARD ~ ~
NO EMAIL OR TEXTUALS Direct Communications only.
• DUPLEX FLAT - THIS IS THE UPPER UNIT
• 5 ROOMS, TWO BEDROOMS, ONE  BATHROOM, DINING ROOM, LIVING ROOM, ENTRY, LAUNDRY ROOM.
•LARGE JUST REMODELED EAT-IN KITCHEN,  NEW GAS STOVE, REFRIGERATOR, DISPOSAL AND DISHWASHER SUPPLIED.
SEPARATE LAUNDRY ROOM - Washer & dryer not provided.
•LARGE CHARMING SUNNY GARDEN and FENCED YARD with shed for garden tools.
Large Wooden deck in yard also.
Joint maintenance responsibility with lower unit required.
FRONT PATIO OVER GARAGE for the morning sun (facing East)
•BEDROOMS ARE SEPARATED BY THE BATHROOMS, SO PRIVACY IS GOOD.
Original wood and leaded glass Hutch with drawers for dining service, entertainment supplies, dining linen, etc.
The dining room is also surrounded with original Wood half-paneling and picture moulding.
CEILING is beamed with original painted floral highlights.
Also has the original decorative fireplace surrounded by wood trim and inset mirror.
Wood wainscotting around the perimeter and picture moulding.
One contains the toilet, and the other room contains the sink, bathtub and shower.
•HARDWOOD REFINISHED FLOORS IN FOYER, LIVING AND DINING ROOMS.
•GAS WALL HEAT AND ELECTRIC BASEBOARD HEAT.
• 2 FIREPLACES, one in Living room and one in Dining room - these are considered decorative only.
This location is a Walker’s Paradise
so daily errands do not require a car.
320 Bocana Street is a seven minute walk from the J CHURCH at the San Jose Ave & Randall St stop.
This location is in the Holly Park neighborhood in San Francisco.
Nearby parks include Holly Park, Bernal Recreation Center and Saint Mary's Recreation Center.
Beautiful Large built-in antique wood hutch in dining roomTwo large original sliding wood doors separate living room from dining room
•TENANT PAYS ALL UTILITIES, INCLUDING TRASH, PGE, PHONE SERVICE.
WATER/SEWER (to be divided and prorated with lower unit, since there is only 1 meter),
TOTAL = $6,300.00 WHICH INCLUDES A SECURITY DEPOSIT OF  ABOUT  ONE AND ONE-HALF MONTHS RENT.
Last month's rent is not included.
•NO SMOKING IN UNIT AND ON PROPERTY GROUNDS.
1/2 BLOCK SOUTH OF CORTLAND AVE, AND 4 BLOCKS EAST OF MISSION.
•WALK TO SHOPPING, LAUNDRY, GREAT RESTAURANTS, BANKING, SAFEWAY, AND OTHER STORES ON CORTLAND A BLOCK AWAY, and MISSION only 3 blocks away.
PLEASE LEAVE YOUR DAY AND EVENING PHONE NUMBERS, and Speak Clearly.
